author: MEREDITH HOFFMAN
description: AUSTIN, Texas (AP) — Texas legislators are seeking to deny work-study aid to immigrants attending public college under a temporary residency permit, a move that starkly contrasts with a policy enacted 16 years ago that positioned the state as the nation's most welcoming place for foreign-born students. Under the proposal, which is on the verge of clearing the Texas Legislature, only individuals eligible for federal financial aid would qualify for the state's off-campus, work-study program.
title: Texas moving to exclude 'dreamers' from college work-study

author: Matthew Diebel
description: A Texas man is suing his date for texting while they were watching a 3D showing of "Guardians of the Galaxy, Vol. 2" at an Austin theater.
title: Texas man sues his date — for texting during 'Guardians of the Galaxy, Vol. 2'

description: An Indian nuclear scientist has been lodged in a detention centre in Texas, United States, since December 2016 on serious charges of harassing and stalking a female student and preventing a police officer from carrying out his duty.
title: Indian nuclear scientist in US jail for stalking Texas university student - Times of India

author: Leanna Garfield, Business Insider
description: The Texas-based construction firm PennaGroup proposed a border wall that only the US side could see through.
title: A construction firm submitted this proposal for Trump's border wall that's a one-way sheet of plexiglass

author: The Associated Press
description: Texas Sen. John Cornyn has told the Trump administration he isn't interested in serving as FBI director.
title: Another Candidate to Replace FBI Director James Comey Drops Out

author: Jennifer Bendery
description: "No one is above the law," said Rep. Al Green (D-Texas). "That includes the president of the United States."
title: It's Time To Impeach Donald Trump, Democrat Says On The House Floor

author: Suhasini Haidar, Varghese George
description: PM to combine diaspora event and energy diplomacy in the Texas city during his U.S. visit in June
title: Modi may do a Madison Square in Houston

author: Karoun Demirjian, Sean Sullivan, Ed O'Keefe, Karoun Demirjian, Sean Sullivan, Ed O'Keefe
description: Potential for messy confirmation fight, other political considerations weigh against Texas senator.
title: Cornyn’s own GOP colleagues are less than enthusiastic about his candidacy for FBI director

author: Paul Kane, Paul Kane
description: The Texas Republican interviewed Saturday for FBI director even as some fellow Republicans said the post should go to someone outside politics.
title: Analysis | Why would Majority Whip John Cornyn leave the Senate? Because it’s a dead-end job.

author: Christopher Mele
description: A 13-year-old boy from Texas took less than a second to answer the word problem in the Raytheon Mathcounts National Competition.
title: Math Champion Wins With Answer About Pecking Chicks
